title: Sensitivity of BTEX pollution and health effects to traffic restrictions: A case study in an urban center of Tehran, Iran
content:

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 104

Author(s): Abbas Norouzian Baghani, Elaheh Dana, Armin Sorooshian, Ahmad Jonidi Jafari, Ali Asghar Aalamolhoda, Razieh Sheikhi, Farzaneh Jajarmi, Abbas Shahsavani, Mahdieh Delikhoon, Gholamreza Ebrahimzade, Qadir Ashournejad, Hossein Jafari Mansoorian, Majid Kermani
